title: Times Now ने व्हाट्सऐप पर आये फ़ेक मेसेज से 30 ‘मृत चीनी सैनिकों’ के नाम टीवी पर पढ़े
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Chinese side didn’t release number of PLA casualties in clash with Indian soldiers. My understanding is the Chinese side doesn’t want people of the two countries to compare the casualties number so to avoid stoking public mood. This is goodwill from Beijing.
